```{r}
# extended GCD by Hermite normal form
library(numbers)

a = matrix(c(
  723217 - 480608, 508811 - 480608),
  nrow = 1, ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)

a
```

```{r}
hnf <- hermiteNF(a)

hnf
```

```{r}
stopifnot(all(a %*% hnf$U == hnf$H))

hnf$H  # GCD
```

```{r}
hnf$U[ , 1]  # multipliers
```

```{r}
hnf$U[1 , 1] * a[1, 1] + hnf$U[2 , 1] * a[1, 2]
```
